code: @BeforeClass public static void startService() {     Endpoint.publish(ORIGINAL_URL, IMPLEMENTATION). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             from(getRouterEndpointURI()).to(getServiceEndpointURI()).         }     }. }

@Test public void testInvokeProxyService() {     JaxWsProxyFactoryBean factory = new JaxWsProxyFactoryBean().     factory.setServiceClass(BareSoapService.class).     factory.setAddress(PROXY_URL).     factory.setBus(BusFactory.newInstance().createBus()).     BareSoapService client = (BareSoapService) factory.create().     client.doSomething().     assertEquals("Proxied service should have been invoked once", 1, IMPLEMENTATION.invocations.get()). }
